DOC.brief_summary: Long Term Observational Extension Study Designed to Monitor Long-Term Efficacy and Safety of Miravirsen Sodium in Combination with Telaprevir and Ribavirin in Subjects with Chronic Hepatitis C Virus Genotype 1 Infection
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Extension Study is Designed to Monitor Long-Term Efficacy and Safety of Miravirsen Sodium in Combination With Telaprevir and Ribavirin in Subjects With Chronic Hepatitis C Virus Genotype 1 Infection
DOC.criteria: Participated in Study SPC3649205 (this would include those who completed study SPC3649205, those who discontinued or terminated the study early for whatever reason (including treatment failure) and those who opted to receive approved therapy for the treatment of HCV infection). Those unwilling to provide informed consent for participation in this study. Subjects who have received investigational drug therapy after discontinuation, termination, or successful completion of Study SPC3649205.
